mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEM (MEMNUM, MEMID, MEMPW, MEMNAME, MEMEMAIL, MEMADERSS, MEMRADERSS, MEMDADRESS, MEMPHONE, INSERTDATE, UPDATEDATE, DELETEYN, ADMINYN) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(A.MEMNUM), 0) + 1 AS CHABUN FROM MEM A), #{memid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mempw, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mememail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memaderss, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memraderss, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memdadress, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memphone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'N', 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMID MEMID ,A.MEMPW MEMPW ,A.ADMINYN ADMINYN FROM MEM A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.MEMID = #{memid, jdbcType = VARCHAR} AND A.MEMPW = #{mempw, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
